description: Source file defining an AuthService class which provides authentication-related functionalities like login, registration, token refresh, and user management for a ReactJS web application.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class that encapsulates authentication operations such as login, registration, logout, token refresh, and user profile management

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticate user with credentials, set auth token, and store user info and refresh token

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Log out the user, clear tokens and user data from storage

methods.name: refreshToken
methods.description: Request a new access token using the refresh token

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Retrieve current authenticated user's info from API

methods.name: verifyEmail
methods.description: Verify user's email using verification token

methods.name: getStoredUser
methods.description: Retrieve stored user data from local storage

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Check if user is currently authenticated

methods.name: hasPermission
methods.description: Check if current user has a specific permission

methods.name: hasRole
methods.description: Check if current user has a specific role

methods.name: hasAnyRole
methods.description: Check if current user has any of the specified roles
